sumstate.description: Global alarm state of device
sumstate.format: enum[0=ok,1=unacknowledged,2=acknowledged,3=alarm]()

brightness.description: Current brightness value in kilo lux (kLx)

brightnessw.description: Current brightness value from the west sensor in kilo lux (kLx)

brightnesso.description: Current brightness value from the east sensor in kilo lux (kLx)

wind.description: Current value of the wind in meter/second (m/s)

temperature.description: Current value of the temperature in degrees celsius (°C)

rain.description: Current value of the accumulated rain in liter/hour (l/h)

sumstate.description: Summary of the states and their formats
sumstate.format: currentState enum[-2=holdDown,-1=movingDown,0=stop,1=movingUp,2=holdUp](); positionLevel float[0.00,100.00](%); rotationLevel float[0.00,100.00](%); elementInfo enum[0=ok,1=manualOff,2=manualOn,3=locked,4=alarm](); rotationRange enum[90=ninety,180=hundredEighty](°);
